name: License in a Flash
title: Fastest Business Setup
description: In 2019, Poland boasted the quickest time to obtain an operating license, taking only 1.2 days, making it the fastest in the world.

name: Girls Finish Strong
title: Top Female Primary Education Completion
description: In 2021, Poland achieved a 100% persistence rate for females reaching the last grade of primary school, showcasing its commitment to female education.

name: Healthy Growth
title: Lowest Child Stunting Rates
description: By 2024, Poland had one of the lowest prevalence rates of stunting among children under 5, at just 1%, reflecting excellent child health standards.

name: Affordable Health
title: Minimal Health Expenditure Burden
description: In 2020, only 0.01% of Poland's population was pushed further below the $3.65 poverty line due to out-of-pocket health care expenses, indicating strong health care affordability.
